note: Recovering (w)academic, ex-artist, untethered researcher/editor/writer (EU research network grants esp), co-founder/booster for Open Syllabus (opensyllabus.org), nettime co-mod for 25 yrs. I was "working at the intersection of" back when that sounded like a red-light districts not a venn diagram. Un/timely nanorants and against-the-grain comments on #dataviz, debris from writing a cultural history of WTF people think “information” looks like. I bounce between the Deep North and the Deep South.
